20e27693-707e-401d-942f-ddfb3ce16d1a.description: The earner of this badge is a Certified Data Science Specialist. The earner understands the essential concepts, tools and techniques required to begin learning data science. The earner can perform basic data handling tasks, collect and analyze data, and present them using industry standard tools. key topics from data science to big data, and the processes of gathering, cleaning and handling data.

de221c7e-fb12-4de3-9fee-8e50d3dea7cc.description: The earner of this badge is a Certified IoT Specialist (CIoTS). The earner will be able to understand the potential of IoTs for their society, in terms of impact on the lives of billions of people and on the world economy. They will also understand the underlying technology that powers IoTs, as well as the challenges that comes with such technologies. The earner also explores many real-life examples of IoT devices that are commercially available.

296f35b1-b3d0-43eb-a579-5c3634e77b61.description: Earners of the Authorized Training Academy Program badge are authorized by iTrain Asia to support the professional development needs of future or current iTrain Asia practitioners and stakeholders in their pursuit of iTrain Asia Credentials within Institute / Campus. And, to conduct iTrain Asia proctored Certification Exam.

badge_template_activities.title: ATP must be a legal business entity for 3 years and pass a background and credit check.
Must use iTrain Asia provided course content
Trainers must complete Authorized Training Partner Train the Trainer programme
ATP must adhere with best services of delivering iTrain Asia Certification Trainings and Exams.

skills.name: iTrain Asia Digital Tech Certification Training
